title: Understanding Cherith's Challenges
text: Consider the daily responsibilities Cherith faces as a single parent of twins with ASD. Think about the time, energy, and resources required.

title: Time Management
text: How might Cherith's time be affected by the needs of her twins?

title: Financial Considerations
text: What financial challenges could arise from the need for multiple services and supports?

title: Emotional and Physical Fatigue
text: Think about the emotional and physical toll of caring for children with high needs.

hintAnswer: Lack of time, more responsibility, high levels of fatigue, financial burdens
title: Identifying Key Challenges
text: List four key challenges Cherith might face as a single parent of twins with ASD.
choices: Lack of time $$-$$ time with the twins reduces the amount of time Cherith has for work and leisure activities. More responsibility as a single parent than having a spouse or partner with whom to share $$day-to-day$$ responsibilities. High levels of fatigue $$--$$ caused by the high levels of care and supervision, or loss of sleep. Financial burdens $$-$$ cost related to multiple services and supports outside the home and school (e.g., medical, therapies) Cherith’s twins receive and cost of gas for transportation between service providers and $$\frac{home}{school}$$. New roles $$-$$ roles in addition to parenting, such as child’s advocate, case manager, inclusion specialist, transition specialist, or medical expert.
